ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Theorizing Diaspora will be helpful to anyone seeking to better understand many of the most pressing issues in contemporary art and theory. Centrally, the fraught relationships between African art , bodies, and migrations and Western knowledge production is contextualized

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Professor Mercer's work has been important to my own, and his seminar has not only helped me better understand the conversations it draws upon, but the insights Diaspora Studies more broadly offers to understanding the modem world.
